meanings.definition: A person who participates in a carpool.
meanings.sent1: The carpoolers arrived at the office together.
meanings.sent2: Many carpoolers share the cost of gas for their daily commute.
meanings.sent3: The carpoolers joked about traffic as they drove to work.
meanings.sent4: The carpoolers formed a tight-knit group on their way to the office.
meanings.sent5: The carpoolers chatted happily during their ride to work.

meanings.definition: The act of sharing a ride to work with others.
meanings.sent1: Carpoolers help reduce traffic congestion during rush hour.
meanings.sent2: The carpoolers took turns driving each week.
meanings.sent3: The carpoolers sang along to the radio on their way to work.
meanings.sent4: The carpoolers' arrangement saved them money on gas.
meanings.sent5: The carpoolers coordinated their schedules for a smooth commute.
